products.title: Addict Sand Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Addict sand roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
products.productdescription: A sophisticated modern design. This print gives a textured look using greys and an injection of colour.

products.title: Addict Sand

products.productdescription:
Min width: 200mm max width: 3048mm

 	guarantee: 12 months
